title: North-South Line travel time extension due to signalling system checks

updates.text: [NSL] UPDATE: Train services are returning to normal. Free regular bus services have ceased.
[NSL] UPDATE: Commuters pls remain calm while train services are progressively resuming. Follow in-train announcements and Twitter updates.
[NSL]UPDATE:Trains are progressively returning to normal speed.Pls expect 15mins additional travel time btwn #MarinaSouthPier & #JurongEast.
[NSL] Due to new signalling system checks, pls add 20mins travel time between #MarinaSouthPier & #JurongEast both bounds. We are sorry.
